name: FACTUpload
description: Uploads files to the FACT platform
author: aDolus Technology Inc.
instanceNameFormat: Uploads files to the FACT platform

inputs.name: FACTServiceConnection
inputs.label: aDolus FACT service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the aDolus FACT service connection to use.

inputs.name: apiClientPath
inputs.label: Path to FACT API Client
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the full path to the FACT API Client executable.

inputs.name: submissionDirectory
inputs.label: Directory of files to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the path of the directory containing the results output files created during the analysis phase of the FACT Composition Engine.

inputs.name: isProductFile
inputs.label: Upload as Vendor File?
inputs.helpMarkDown: True to upload to the Product Files portal, False to upload to the End-User portal
